actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means, H. Rept. 93-306.
Referred to Senate Committee on on Finance.
Committee on Finance discharged in Senate.

official_title: A bill to continue for a temporary period the existing suspension of duty on certain istle.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Continues under the Tariff Schedules of the United States for a period of three years (until September 5, 1975) the existing suspension of duty on istle. Amends 19 U.S.C. 1202 Permits the President, under the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970, to make appropriate adjustments in the maximum price which may be charged under the June 13, 1973, price freeze for any agricultural commodity certified as at unacceptably low supply levels as a result of the freeze.

titles.title: A bill to continue for a temporary period the existing suspension of duty on certain istle.
